dialogue: Spirit and Tequia arrive at Regnum.
Spirit notes how soldiers greet Tequia on sight.
Good afternoon, Ms. Tequia!
Good afternoon!
You're quite popular, aren't you Ms. Tequia?
Perks of the job. But enough about that. What do you think
about the Empire? Quite different from your home planet, no?
Spirit couldn't help but agree. The capital city was
an architectural masterpiece, even to her eyes.
It radiated a feeling of wealth and power in equal parts.
It was almost enough to make her forget the rumors
she heard about the Empire. Almost.
It looks amazing. Almost too much to be real.
I see...Well, we should get moving.
We're going to meet with the Empress
to introduce you and receive our next assignment.
Remember to practice proper etiquette,
do not speak directly unless you are spoken to,
do not insult or undermine her highness in any way...
Tequia gave Spirit instructions to follow
until they finally reached the palace doors.
